Week ending 24 April 2022 
@SQMResearch

Final clearance rate was 48.0% from…

Melbourne final housing auction results. 
Week ending 24 April 2022 
@SQMResearch

Final clearance rate was 48.0% from 731 scheduled auctions.

Same week last year was 59.0% from 988 auctions.

This week sees 1,323 auctions for Melbourne.
